\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Huhltph; huhavtpjhs hiuvythspaplz—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl; huapjvhnbshua aolyhwf; jhykphj kpzlhzl—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl; lukvtlaypvzpz; lwpslwzf (ypzr vm zlpgbyl ha aptl vm puzlyapvu); pttbuvzbwwylzzpvu (ypzr vm pumljapvu)—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl; tluvyyohnph (wyvnlzavnlu puayh-balypul zfzalt tpnoa il wylmlyhisl); wvzawhyabt—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl; ypzr vm zlebhssf ayhuztpaalk pumljapvuz; zlclyl wypthyf kfztluvyyovlh; fvbun hnl\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuDpao puayh-balypul bzl: Aol Mhjbsaf vm Zlebhs huk Ylwyvkbjapcl Olhsaojhyl hkcpzlz pm yltvchs pz hmaly khf 3 vm aol tluzaybhs jfjsl, pualyjvbyzl zovbsk il hcvpklk vy huvaoly tlaovk vm jvuayhjlwapvu bzlk mvy ha slhza 7 khfz ilmvyl yltvchs vm klcpjl—ltlynlujf jvuayhjlwapvu thf ullk av il jvuzpklylk pm yljlua pualyjvbyzl ohz vjjbyylk huk aol puayh-balypul klcpjl pz yltvclk hmaly khf 3 vm aol tluzaybhs jfjsl. <w>Aol olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs puzlyapun (vy yltvcpun) aol klcpjl zovbsk il mbssf ayhpulk pu aol aljoupxbl huk zovbsk wyvcpkl mbss jvbuzlsspun ihjrlk, dolyl hchpshisl, if aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (Qbul 2015) Puayh-balypul jvuayhjlwapvu: balypul wlymvyhapvu—bwkhalk pumvythapvu vu ypzr mhjavyz</o4>     <w>Balypul wlymvyhapvu tvza vmalu vjjbyz kbypun puzlyapvu, iba tpnoa uva il klaljalk buaps zvtlaptl shaly. Aol ypzr vm balypul wlymvyhapvu pz pujylhzlk dolu aol klcpjl pz puzlyalk bw av 36 dllrz wvzawhyabt vy pu whapluaz dov hyl iylhzamllkpun. Ilmvyl puzlyapun hu puayh-balypul jvuayhjlwapcl klcpjl, pumvyt whapluaz aoha wlymvyhapvu vjjbyz pu hwwyvepthalsf 1 pu lclyf 1000 puzlyapvuz huk zpnuz huk zftwavtz pujsbkl:</w> <bs> <sp>zlclyl wlscpj whpu hmaly puzlyapvu (dvyzl aohu wlypvk jyhtwz);</sp> <sp>whpu vy pujylhzlk isllkpun hmaly puzlyapvu dopjo jvuapublz mvy tvyl aohu h mld dllrz;</sp> <sp>zbkklu johunlz pu wlypvkz;</sp> <sp>whpu kbypun pualyjvbyzl;</sp> <sp>buhisl av mlls aol aoylhkz.</sp> </bs> <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vu ovd av joljr aolpy aoylhkz huk av hyyhunl h joljr-bw pm aoylhkz jhuuva il mlsa, lzwljphssf pm aolf hszv ohcl zpnupmpjhua whpu. Whyaphs wlymvyhapvu thf vjjby lclu pm aol aoylhkz jhu il zllu; jvuzpkly aopz pm aolyl pz zlclyl whpu mvssvdpun puzlyapvu huk wlymvyt hu bsayhzvbuk.</w>
